author: ghudson
msg: Revert r10731.  While it's true that the output of
svn_path_canonicalize may contain a double slash in the authority
section of a URL, passing a URL to svn_path_dirname is a botch,
particularly if we reach the authority section ("http:" is not the
dirname of "http://hostname").  The short-term solution for this trap
door is to avoid passing URLs to path-specific svn_path functions; the
long-term (2.0) solution is to separate out the functions which
operate on URLs from ones which operate on paths.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/path.c (previous_segment): Don't skip over
multiple slashes, since we shouldn't see them.

author: ghudson
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/info-cmd.c (svn_cl__info): Display an
error if the user mistakenly passes a URL to "svn info".
(Otherwise, we start calling svn_path_dirname on a URL, which is a
botch given how the path API currently works.)

author: ringstrom
msg: Fix the inverted logic in 'svnadmin recover' that breaks the warning
message when the repository lock cannot be immediately acquired.
* subversion/svnadmin/main.c
(subcommand_recover): Return if the error was *not* EAGAIN.

author: maxb
msg: Resolve issue 1415.
Test whether gcc supports -std=c89 when in maintainer mode, don't base the
decision on an incomplete list of platforms.
Based on a patch by Leif Eriksen <leif.eriksen_at_hpa.com.au>.
* build/ac-macros/svn-macros.m4 (SVN_MAYBE_ADD_TO_CFLAGS): New macro.
* configure.in (enable-maintainer-mode): Use it.

author: maxb
msg: Implement tab-completion for svnshell.py.
Inspired by a patch by Craig Howard <craig.howard_at_shadnet.shad.ca>.
Resolves issue 1459.
* tools/examples/svnshell.py
(SVNShell._parse_path): Avoid exception if path is "".
(SVNShell._complete): New function.
(SVNShell.complete_cd): New function.
(SVNShell.complete_cat): New function.
(SVNShell.complete_ls): New function.
(SVNShell.complete_pcat): New function.
